APPETIZERS

#1 SHUMAI | 10 PC | $13.97

Ground pork, shrimp, carrots and green onion wrapped in wonton wrappers steamed and garnished with crispy onion served with dipping sauce.

#2 SALAD ROLL | 3 PC | $10.97

Fresh green leaf, cucumber, carrot, vermicelli rice noodle, sliced roasted pork wrapped in rice paper served with home-made peanut sauce.

#21 SPRING ROLL | 2 PC $5.00 | 6 PC $12.00

Deep fried spring rolls filled with shredded cabbage, carrot, onion, and bean noodle served with sweet chili sauce.

#22 MOO PING | 3 PC $10.00 | 6 PC $18.00

Grilled pork or chicken skewers marinated in our home made sweet & savory Thai spices.

#22 SAMOSA | 6 PC $10.00

Deep fried samosas filled with potato, onion, green peas, and carrot served with sweet chili sauce.
